煞住.definition: to brake; to stop; to forbid

煞到.definition: (Tw) to like; to fall in love with

煞尾.definition: to finish off; to wind up

煞有介事.definition: to make a show of being very much in earnest (idiom); to act as if one is taking things very seriously

煞有其事.definition: see 煞有介事[sha4 you3 jie4 shi4]

煞氣.definition: baleful look; inauspicious influence; (of a tire, balloon etc) to leak air

煞氣騰騰.definition: variant of 殺氣騰騰|杀气腾腾[sha1 qi4 teng2 teng2]

煞筆.definition: to stop one's pen; to break off writing; final remarks (at the end of a book or article)

煞費苦心.definition: to take a lot of trouble (idiom); painstaking; at the cost of a lot of effort

煞風景.definition: to be an eyesore; (fig.) to spoil the fun; to be a wet blanket
